response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on you, I am offering you the chance to own it for a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its worth and your appreciation for such a valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
